headline: Schwab Kicks Off 2026 With Expanded Education Experiences
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, January 15, 2026--Charles Schwab, the retail trading leader facilitating the most trades of any publicly traded financial services firm, today announced enhancements to its comprehensive education offer. 2026 will bring additional in-person and virtual events as well as an enriched talent and programming line up to its media affiliate, the Schwab Network.* These enhancements come in response to record engagement at Schwab in 2025.
